synopsis.text:
Before the curtains close, they must dazzle a hundred hearts! Meet the Idolls, a group of aspiring idols who've spent three years chasing their dreams with only three devoted fans to show for it. Frustrated and desperate for a breakthrough, the girls receive an unexpected push from a mysterious talking wooden statue. The challenge? Fill every seat in the prestigious Hoi Hoi Hall within just nine days!

With their dreams hanging in the balance, the girls embark on a thrilling race against time to prove their worth. Using motion capture technology to bring their performances to life, the Idolls must captivate an audience like never before. Can Aina, Ami, Shiori, and Ruka rise to the occasion and transform their fortunes, or will their dreams crumble under the pressure?

Join the Idolls on their 10-day journey of passion, perseverance, and friendship as they strive to leave their mark on the idol world and fill the seats at Hoi Hoi Hall!
